article_title: Ron Johnson: I'm Suing Over ObamaCare Exemptions for Congress
article_text:
On Monday, Jan. 6, I am filing suit in the U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of Wisconsin to make Congress live by the letter of the health-care law it imposed on the rest of America. By arranging for me and other members of Congress and their staffs to receive benefits intentionally ruled out by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, the administration has exceeded its legal authority.

The president and his congressional supporters have also broken their promise to the American people that ObamaCare...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Wisconsin Sen. Ron Johnson writes that if the president wants to change the health-care law, he must ask Congress to do it.
twitter.title: I'm Suing Over ObamaCare Exemptions for Congress

image.alt: Ron Johnson: I'm Suing Over ObamaCare Exemptions for Congress
